definition: to offer a sacrifice to (gods or ancestors)/memorial ceremony/(in classical novels) to recite an incantation to activate a magic weapon/(lit. and fig.) to wield
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice

sentences.english: The summer monsoon of East Asia and monsoon mode also has obvious interdecadal changes.
sentences.chinese: 東亞夏季風和季風模態還存在明顯的年代際變化。

sentences.english: Translation is a long lasting human activity.
sentences.chinese: 翻譯是不同民族語際交流的實踐活動。

sentences.english: How did you hear about LiaoNing Comfort International travel Server ?
sentences.chinese: 您從哪裏瞭解到遼寧康輝國際旅行社？

sentences.english: Today's broad array of Trotskyist Internationals are split over which organisation represents its political continuity.
sentences.chinese: 今天一系列第四際的延續組織廣泛存在分歧。

sentences.english: I recommend 55mph, like on the New York Interstate .
sentences.chinese: 我建議以55英里的時速就好，就像比紐約州際鐵路。

sentences.english: The catalogue so amended will be discussed and determined by the Inter-ministerial Work Coordination Team.
sentences.chinese: 修訂後的目錄經部際工作協調小組討論確定。

sentences.english: In such an analysis, pure inter-subjective communication is rare.
sentences.chinese: 在這個分析中，純粹的主體際交流是不常發生的。

sentences.english: On the other hand, ECMWF data are probably nearer reality on the interdecadal timescale.
sentences.chinese: ECMWF資料在年代際尺度變化上更接近觀測資料。

sentences.english: Thanks to the Internet, the university implemented15 the Inter-Library Loan system.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧有了互聯網，大學得以使用圖書館際租借系統。

sentences.english: The properties of rhizosphere soil of pot-cultured tea plants were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文報導了對盆栽茶樹根際土壤性質的研究結果。

sentences.english: The chess match of man and machine.
sentences.chinese: 國的人類與機器的際象棋比賽。

definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
